predicate.note: Frames file for 'co-exist' based on sentences in ebc. Verbnet classes 36.1 and 47.1; other framed members include bargain, collaborate, consort, flirt, haggle, mate, negotiate, rendezvous, dwell, flourish, live, persist, remain, thrive, wait.

example.name: both args
example.text: How-1 will the animals co-exist with humans *T*-1 ?

example.name: co-existers in same argument
example.text: Renown wildlife advocate Jack Hannah director...of the Columbus Zoo recently went to Rwanda *PRO* to see how-2 the people and animals are co-existing *T*-2.
